---
title: "PRC Data Challenge"
type: bibliography
---

The [Performance Review Commission (PRC)](/about/prc) Data Challenge aims at engaging with
data scientists to create teams and compete to solve interesting data problem
for the Aviation community.
The focus is on **open data** and **open solutions** in order to achieve wide
distribution and reproducibility.
